summary: Does anyone have any Andi Mack Party Ideas?
body:
Does anyone have any Andi Mack Party Ideas?

Hello people of the Andi Mack Fandom!My 17th birthday is in a couple of weeks, and I want to have an Andi Mack themed party. Does anyone have any ideas on what to do?

My birthday is on a Friday, so obviously we’re going to watch the new episode with milkshakes and baby taters, but please let me know if you have any ideas!!

summary: so i’m guessing the next am episode is gunna be one of those that try and fit like 6 different storylines into a 20 minute...
question: so i’m guessing the next am episode is gunna be one of those that try and fit like 6 different storylines into a 20 minute episode bc from what i know, there is gunna be bex/wedding invitations, jamber, kira character development, muffy, andi’s costume thing + tyrus’ costume thing. lmao they should really make the episodes 40 minutes long.

(I agree they need longer episodes though)

summary: A prompt where Jonah is restless in bed wondering if he is bi because he might have a crush on Cyrus... so he wakes up and...
question: A prompt where Jonah is restless in bed wondering if he is bi because he might have a crush on Cyrus... so he wakes up and decides to send him the “you’re girly (gnarly) text
answer:
Considering how he’s been tossing and turning all night on the verge of what feels like back to back anxiety attacks, Jonah’s so lucky that he doesn’t have school tomorrow.

What he does have though, is frisbee practice, and he has no idea how he isn’t going to sleep through that if he doesn’t fall asleep any moment now.

But that’s not what’s important. What is important, is that he’s pretty sure he might just like boys in addition to girls. Or, maybe not all boys. Maybe just one boy in general. Just one. But not just any boy.

Cyrus Goodman, is this boy.

Why did this have to happen to him? Why did he have to get swept up in Cyrus’ adorable charm just as much as Cyrus seems to get swept up in Jonah’s…Whatever it is he’s got going for him.

Jonah can tell Cyrus is intrigued by him, he just doesn’t see why. Yeah, he’s got a chill attitude going for him, but that still doesn’t mean he isn’t always dying on the inside whenever he goes up to talk to him.

And the part that stands out most about this, is that he thinks he might make Cyrus nervous, too. That’s good, right? No, it can’t be. Jonah doesn’t want him worrying whenever he’s around.

He can’t take it anymore. Whatever this whole thing’s about, he’s got to sit himself up and take some action. So he grabs his phone off of the floor, and drafts his first text to Cyrus ever. He’s pretty sure he was just as nervous getting his number as Cyrus was giving it to him.

He needs to say something extravagant. Not too dull, but not too gay sounding, ether.

He turns on the caps lock.

U ARE GNARLY.

Before he can overthink it, he hits send, drops his phone onto the covers, and whines fast first into his pillow.

That’s it. He has to fall asleep right now or he’s screwed.

Right after he checks to make sure if the text went through or not.

And then, he sees it. The typo. The god forsaken typo.

U ARE GIRLY.

“No!” Jonah yells in terror, and after some serious contemplating, he sees no other option than to shut off his phone and hide it in his closet, which is the same exact place where he happens to be not only physically, but psychologically.

After experiencing an unnecessarily large amount of muddled panic, it’s ironically where Jonah ends up finally falling asleep.

It’s about time that his damning thoughts finally put him to rest.

summary: tj and cyrus at a sleepover bc i stan
question: tj and cyrus at a sleepover bc i stan
answer:
Oooo! Good one!!

*********************

Summary: Cyrus asked Tj to hangout after school. Cyrus thought Tj would say no, but he didn’t. So Cyrus is now in full panic mode. But once things started to get settled in, a huge snow storm rolls around and Tj is now stuck at Cyrus’s house.

Lets begin!!

**********************

“You got the muffins? Right?? You didn’t forget the muffins mom, did you?!” Cyrus was nervously walking around in his kitchen.

Earlier that day, he asked Tj if he wanted to come to his house after school to hangout, but Cyrus thought he would say no and come up with some excuse. But little did Cyrus know, Tj said “yes!! I’m more than happy too!” After he said yes, Cyrus was in full panic mode the whole day. Yes, Tj has hungout with him before, but that was with friends. It’s never just been him and Tj.

“Yes hunny. I got them. Don’t worry!!” Cyrus’s mom said trying to calm him down. “Your so worried about these muffins, and Tj coming over. Your acting like your girlfriend is coming. Chill out bud!” His mom said back.

Cyrus blushed. He totally forgot his mom doesn’t know he’s gay, and the fact that he did have a crush on Tj, wasn’t helping. He needed to make tonight count. He wanted to make Tj happy. Though he didn’t know what Tjs sexuality was, he still needed to make his best impression. Just Incase.

***************************

“Chocolate muffins!! All to ourselves?! Sweet!!” Tj said as he walked into Cyrus’s kitchen. “Now I don’t need to scare any kids off for you!”

Cyrus has a huge smile and was trying so hard to not squeal with excitement.

“Six chocolate muffins, three for each of us. We’re the real VIP.” Cyrus said back.

Tj laughed.

Both boys sat on the counter and ate a muffin while they discussed their days. But during that, the tv went off with a special weather advisory.

“Winter storm advisory. Huge winter storm coming in tonight around 7pm. also high winds. Don’t go outside. Stay inside if possible.” The news guy reported.

Both Cyrus and Tj looked at each other, then the time. It was already 6:30pm.

“Wow. It’s really coming.” Cyrus’s mom said walking into the kitchen.

“Should I go home now?” Tj asked. “I can ask my mom to pick me up.”

“NO!!” Cyrus yelled.

He didn’t mean to yell. But he didn’t want Tj to leave, he was having too much fun.

Both Tj and his mom looked at him confused. Cyrus’s hands started to sweat.

“What I mean is, if it’s okay with you mom, can he spend the night?” He asked.

This was the perfect and right time to ask. He always wanted Tj to stay the night.

“Ooo that would actually be pretty cool!” Tj said. “There’s this scary movie I wanted to watch… the classic, but new one, IT!! I haven’t watched it yet, But I’ve been wanting too! And your the perfect guy to watch it with.”

Even though Cyrus hated scary movies, he loved that Tj got so excited.

“If it’s okay with your mom, our house is your house!” Cyrus’s mom replied. “But Cyrus hunny, I thought you didn’t like scary movi-”

“Whhhhaaaattt?! Mom!! I was 10!! I’m over that!! I love them!!” Cyrus said to his mom.

“Uh, didn’t you just say last week you didn’t want to go see the-”

“Tj! You should call your mom now. Just to make sure just Incase you can’t!” Cyrus said interrupting his mom.

“Haha okay! Will do! Brb!”

(Sorry for moving so fast, I’m trying to keep this story short since I have a limit:) )

****************************

Later on that night, both boys were in Cyrus’s basement getting ready to watch it.

“Popcorn?” Cyrus asked.

“Check.” Tj replied. “Drinks?”

Cyrus looked around. “Check!!” He said back. “Blankets?”

“Check!!” Tj replied. “And last but not least… chocolate muffin number three?”

“Ha! Check!” Cyrus said back cheerfully.

“Alright!! Ready to watch the movie?” Cyrus said as he held up the remote.

Cyrus wasn’t. He was scared for his life, but he wanted to make Tj happy. So he took a huge breath and shook his head.

Tj pressed the play button on the remote. The movie begun. Cyrus so far was okay, ‘maybe this isn’t so scary after all.’ He said to himself. But then when the character Gorgie went to the sewer to find pennywise, Cyrus’s hands started to sweat. He couldn’t scream. He couldn’t embarrass himself.

He looked over at Tj and had the smallest hope that he was also scared and they could just tune it off, but Tj was so in to it and not scared one bit. Cyrus looked back to the tv.

Pennywise started to open his mouth to take the kids arm, that’s when Cyrus couldn’t take it. He started to shake, and hid his face. Tj saw him.

“Hey.” He said as he paused the tv. “Everything alright?” He asked.

“Yeah!! Everything’s fine!!” Cyrus said trying to cover up his lie. “I’m- my nose!! It’s cold!!” But he knew that didn’t work.

“You’re scared, aren’t you?” Tj said.

Cyrus looked down with shame. “I’m so sorry, I am. I totally ruined this night. I’m so sor-”

Tj stoped Cyrus. “Hey! Don’t be! I should be though.” He said.

“Why?” Cyrus asked.

“Because, I should’ve asked if you liked scary movies. I totally understand if you don’t want to watch this.” He said back.

But Cyrus knew he wasn’t just fine. He could hear the disappointment in tjs voice. He knew he wasn’t mad at Cyrus, he was just really excited to watch this movie. Cyrus couldn’t see him like this. “No. You know what, my friend Andi was scared when she first watched her scary movie, but now she likes them! If she can do it, I can!” Cyrus said with excitement.

Tj looked at him with a smile. “Are you sure?” He asked.

“Yes! I just might accidentally hug you.” Cyrus said with a giggle.

Tj laughed. “Hey! That’s alright. You know… I’m fine if you want to come closer… it is kinda cold.” Tj said while blushing.

Cyrus knew what he meant which made him smile and blush, and now his question was answered.

“Sure!” Cyrus said softly. “Why not!”

He scooted towards Tj and Tj pressed play. For the rest of the movie, both boys had their scared moments, but laughed them out.

This was the best sleepover ever.

Summary: Cyrus asked Tj to hangout after school. Cyrus thought Tj would say no, but he didn’t. So Cyrus is now in full panic mode. But once things started to get settled in, a huge snow storm rolls around and Tj is now stuck at Cyrus’s house.

Lets begin!!

**********************

“You got the muffins? Right?? You didn’t forget the muffins mom, did you?!” Cyrus was nervously walking around in his kitchen.

Earlier that day, he asked Tj if he wanted to come to his house after school to hangout, but Cyrus thought he would say no and come up with some excuse. But little did Cyrus know, Tj said “yes!! I’m more than happy too!” After he said yes, Cyrus was in full panic mode the whole day. Yes, Tj has hungout with him before, but that was with friends. It’s never just been him and Tj.

“Yes hunny. I got them. Don’t worry!!” Cyrus’s mom said trying to calm him down. “Your so worried about these muffins, and Tj coming over. Your acting like your girlfriend is coming. Chill out bud!” His mom said back.

Cyrus blushed. He totally forgot his mom doesn’t know he’s gay, and the fact that he did have a crush on Tj, wasn’t helping. He needed to make tonight count. He wanted to make Tj happy. Though he didn’t know what Tjs sexuality was, he still needed to make his best impression. Just Incase.

***************************

“Chocolate muffins!! All to ourselves?! Sweet!!” Tj said as he walked into Cyrus’s kitchen. “Now I don’t need to scare any kids off for you!”

Cyrus has a huge smile and was trying so hard to not squeal with excitement.

“Six chocolate muffins, three for each of us. We’re the real VIP.” Cyrus said back.

Tj laughed.

Both boys sat on the counter and ate a muffin while they discussed their days. But during that, the tv went off with a special weather advisory.

“Winter storm advisory. Huge winter storm coming in tonight around 7pm. also high winds. Don’t go outside. Stay inside if possible.” The news guy reported.

Both Cyrus and Tj looked at each other, then the time. It was already 6:30pm.

“Wow. It’s really coming.” Cyrus’s mom said walking into the kitchen.

“Should I go home now?” Tj asked. “I can ask my mom to pick me up.”

“NO!!” Cyrus yelled.

He didn’t mean to yell. But he didn’t want Tj to leave, he was having too much fun.

Both Tj and his mom looked at him confused. Cyrus’s hands started to sweat.

“What I mean is, if it’s okay with you mom, can he spend the night?” He asked.

This was the perfect and right time to ask. He always wanted Tj to stay the night.

“Ooo that would actually be pretty cool!” Tj said. “There’s this scary movie I wanted to watch… the classic, but new one, IT!! I haven’t watched it yet, But I’ve been wanting too! And your the perfect guy to watch it with.”

Even though Cyrus hated scary movies, he loved that Tj got so excited.

“If it’s okay with your mom, our house is your house!” Cyrus’s mom replied. “But Cyrus hunny, I thought you didn’t like scary movi-”

“Whhhhaaaattt?! Mom!! I was 10!! I’m over that!! I love them!!” Cyrus said to his mom.

“Uh, didn’t you just say last week you didn’t want to go see the-”

“Tj! You should call your mom now. Just to make sure just Incase you can’t!” Cyrus said interrupting his mom.

“Haha okay! Will do! Brb!”

blog.name: mackmeta

blog.description: I'm Dave (he/him). I'm a fan of Andi Mack, Riverdale, and Girl Meets World, and other shows and movies. Feel free to send me asks!

summary: Looks like in addition to the Ham related reshoots they have been doing they're also taking the opportunity to reshoot some...
body: Looks like in addition to the Ham related reshoots they have been doing they’re also taking the opportunity to reshoot some basketball. The age range and the higher pay suggest this might be for a stunt double for Sofia which would have to be for the Spikes big game in 3x19. They already need middle school students for that Saturday and it would be very easy to get them into the stands if they need some crowd reaction shots
